title: Understanding Privacy-Aware Culture
text: A privacy-aware culture is essential for organizations to handle data responsibly. It involves creating an environment where privacy is prioritized and integrated into all processes.

hintAnswer: a common connecting tissue between teams that operate in distant silos but need to share context for collective progress
title: Key Component of Privacy-Aware Culture
text: What is a key component that connects teams in a privacy-aware culture?
choices: a common connecting tissue between teams that operate in distant silos but need to share context for collective progress
